data.author: htan@insider.com (Huileng Tan)
data.title: Gold still has room to run in 2026, even after a record-setting year
data.description: Gold's next rally won't need a crisis — the world's dysfunction is the catalyst.
data.content:
Gold is finishing 2025 at all-time highs, and the momentum is set to extend into 2026.
The spot gold price surged past $4,500 per troy ounce for the first time on Wednesday in Asia trading and is tr… [+2389 chars]

data.author: Matthew Kronsberg, Bloomberg
data.title: Move over caviar, the hottest luxury ingredient is crab
data.description: Large, live specimens from the far corners of the world, like snow crab from Japan and red king crab from Norway, are this season’s luxury signifiers.
data.content: Its a perplexing time in the world of luxury ingredients. Prestigious products have become inextricably tied to fast food. Caviar now adorns chicken nuggets; truffle features in supermarket hummus an… [+6959 chars]
